component.name: ExpressionBoxPlot
component.doc: Box plots of expression values per gene and sample group. List of gene IDs to be plotted is either specified via input component 'geneIds' or via parameter 'hgncs'.
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: geneIds
input.doc: CSV file with gene IDs (one per row).

parameter.name: hgnc
parameter.doc: Comma separated list of HGNC gene symbols.

parameter.name: groupOrder
parameter.doc: Comma separated list of sample group names as they should appear in box plots.

parameter.name: labelOutliers
parameter.doc: If true, outlier expression values (i.e. values outside whiskers) are overplotted with sample names. See also parameter 'cexSampleLabel'.

parameter.name: cexDot
parameter.doc: Relative expansion factor for dot size.

parameter.name: cexSampleLabel
parameter.doc: Relative expansion factor for sample labels when labeling outliers. Parameter 'labelOutliers' must be true for this parameter to have an effect.

parameter.name: sectionTitle
parameter.doc: Title of the LaTeX section or an empty string to omit the section

parameter.name: sectionType
parameter.doc: Type of LaTeX section: usually one of section, subsection or subsubsection. No section statement is written if sectionTitle is empty.
